title: Black Screen after champion select Patch 7.5, 7.6, 7.7
body:
This bug has been going on pretty much ever since I switched to the new client that was released.

I enter champion select (the mode doesn't matter), select my champion, and the client goes to enter the loading screen and it just goes black. Doesn't matter how long I wait it's just black. I can't tab out, can't go to task manager, can't click anywhere, nothing. The only thing I can do is force reboot my computer. One day I tried to go into a game and it worked for awhile, but then a few days ago I tried to go into a flex ranked game with some friends and it went back to giving me a black screen every time.

If anyone has this problem and/or has found a fix please let me know. I've lost so much lp over this stupid thing.

replies.body: When the screen turns black, keep pressing space bar+enter+delete. It worked for me! I found this on another user's post! :D I hope it works for you!
I found that by running the launcher.admin.exe with admin permissions fixes the game

When you go from champion into the loading screen, your client needs to make a new connection with the specific game server you'll be playing on. It seems like your network might be having some troubles making a solid connection there, so it can't find any of the data to display which is why that loading screen stays black.

Let's go through our [**Connection Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) so that we can narrow down what's causing this little hiccup. Hit me back up if you have any issues!

Thank you for replying initially. Unfortunately the problem did not stay fixed. I followed the connection guide, used the hextech repair and it worked, but only for so long. I now have the problem again and it's no longer getting fixed by using the hextech repair. 

Any further suggestions?

If it's still happening, grab the [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) to generate some logs and shoot those over to our tech guys in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). They'll be able to look over those logs and better see what's going wrong!
